name: Jake Newmeyer

text: They were just straight up rude. All we did was come in to get our pickup order and the lady automatically assumed that we were dining in and she straight up yelled at us. She was super rude. If I could I would give zero stars. The worst experience Iâ€™ve had here. Do not recommend.

text: Dropped in about 1205 for the lunch buffet ,quite a few people here but didn't have to wait for a table.salad bar was nice and very well stocked but the pizza bar was nearly empty the whole time we were there. People waiting for pizza to be â€¦More

text: Had a birthday party there with grandkids. Food was delicious and our waitress was wonderful. Will come back!!

name: Natalie James
text: Hope things are changing for better.  Was a great place to go when Gayle managed it.  There was a time after she left that buffet was not very good.  Seemed to be better at recent visit.  Hope so.  We need good restaurants in Clay Center.

text: Went to lunch with my wife and a couple of work colleagues. We all had the buffet and salad bar. I bit into a slice of pizza only to discover it had a hair baked into the cheese. I took the slice to the counter to show the employees. Our â€¦More

text: My favorite dish is the black forest ham sandwich with potato chips & a pickle when dining alone.  Nice restaurant in clay center, friendly staff and delicious food.

name: Shelby O'Sullivan
text: My family and I were dismayed when they eliminated the pizza buffet night. We just love pizza too much to quit going. Every time we eat here or carryout, all things are satisfying.

name: Kim Berggren
text: The last two times dining in they forgot our second pizza we ordered. While we were there for over an hour we witnessed them mess up 5 other orders. This was on a slow Sunday. I would hate to eat here on a busy night! Wish there were more â€¦More

name: Angela Parsell
text: Called well ahead of the dinner rush for two pizzas, was told fifteen minutes... just to wait over half an hour for pizzas that were not what we ordered. Asked for a discount only to hear the manager start cursing within earshot of the customers. Too bad I can't rate it below 1 star. Needs new management

text: I love pizza so I'm gratful to have this in town. As an Italian snobe it's hard to give any chain pizza a high rating. So, I'll base it on service, price and atmosphere. Their salad bar is one of the best options for lunch in town. I â€¦More

text: The staff in this store are very unprofessional, the last time we picked up a to go order the waitresses were joking around and no serving customers, they also don't double check the orders and make sure you have everything you ordered. â€¦More
